org.jetel.data.parser

Class XPathContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.parser.XPathContext

  • public class XPathContext
extends java.lang.Object
    The XPathContext is class that evaluates xpaths and other xpath contexts. A result is stored into DataRecord.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XPathContext(net.sf.saxon.sxpath.XPathExpression exp, java.lang.String xpath)
      Creates new xpath context.
